casebody.data:
Criterion Advertising Company, Inc., Plaintiff-Appellee, v. Sportsman’s Park et al., Defendants-Appellants.(No. 56294;First DistrictDecember 4, 1972.Nash, Ahern & McNally, of Chicago, for appellants.George W. Hamman, of Mayer, Brown & Platt, of Chicago, for appellee.

Opinion by Mr. PRESIDING JUSTICE GOLDBERG.
